text: Georgi Gadzhev (born 8 June 1941) is a Bulgarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1980 Summer Olympics, winning a silver medal in the team dressage event. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Bulgaria Category:Equestrians at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Olympic silver medalists for Bulgaria Category:Olympic medalists in equestrian Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Georgi Gadzhev
